metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10188 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in bitlbee-libpurple before 3.5 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code by causing a file transfer connection to expire.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10188` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bitlbee - 3.5-2
bitlbee-common - 3.5-2
bitlbee-libpurple - 3.5-2
bitlbee-plugin-otr - 3.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bitlbee package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5-2').
